articles.description: After a long conflict, former world no.3 Juan Martin del Potro and the Argentina Open director Martin Jaite embrace each other as they reconcile.
articles.content:

articles.title: Tiago PZK, LIT Killah, Nicki Nicole, Maria Becerra Top Argentina Hot 100
articles.description: It's the title with the third-most weeks at No. 1, along with Maluma and The Weeknd’s “Hawai” and Pedro Capo’s “Calma” with Farruko, since the chart launched in 2018.
articles.content:
Tiago PZK, LIT Killah, Nicki Nicole and Maria Becerra are pushing to break a record as their remix of “Entre Nosotros” tops the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart (dated Feb. 5) for a 12th week.
It’s the third-most weeks at the top, along with Maluma ... [2630 chars]

articles.description: A dozen children stare as if hypnotized at the fire heating a pot of stew.
articles.content: View of Puerta 8, a low income neighborhood north of Buenos Aires, Argentina, Wednesday, Feb. 9, 2022, where contaminated cocaine may have been sold. A batch of that toxic cocaine has killed at least 23 people and hospitalized many more, according to... [4272 chars]

articles.title: Argentina Open: Fabio Fognini Finds Winning Formula in Buenos Aires
articles.description: Fabio Fognini defeated Pedro Martinez 6-4, 7-6(5) to book his place in the quarter-finals of the Argentina Open.
articles.content: Fabio Fognini reached the quarter-finals of a tour-level event for the first time since April, defeating Spain’s Pedro Martinez 6-4, 7-6(5) at the Argentina Open. The fourth seed Italian set the wheels in motion as he out-maneuvered Martinez with his... [2219 chars]

articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES (AP) — Top-seeded Casper Ruud of Norway advanced to the semifinals of the Argentina Open on Friday with a comfortable 6-3, 6-4 win against home-crowd favorite Federico Coria.
